title: change.org brand font?
content:
i noticed the change.org logo and liked the lowercase g. at first i was thinking it was news gothic, but it seemed just a little off to me. anyone know?

[http://www.change.org/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213538/http:/www.change.org/)  
 [http://airbagindustries.com/book/change.php](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213538/http:/airbagindustries.com/book/change.php)

thanks.
